titleStmt.title: An arrest on the East India privatier as per advice and copy sent to its commander Sr. J. C. from H. K. near Hamburgh.
titleStmt.author: H. K.

notesStmt.note: Imprint from Wing; dated at foot of A1r: 16 Sept. 1681.
"Reasons for constituting a new East-India Company in London" has caption title on A1v.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
